doc:
Michael Burns (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Burns_(actor) 0 Michael Thornton Burns (born December 30, 1947) is an American professor emeritus of history at Mount Holyoke College, as well as a published author and former television and film child actor. Michael_Thornton_Burns ( born December_30 , 1947 ) is an_American_professor_emeritus of history at Mount_Holyoke_College , as_well_as a_published_author and former_television_and_film_child_actor .
